CustomField.description: 3-Confident no problem, would want on school list (strong pipeline, rarely need to do new outreach and if we do, it is easy) 2-Somewhat confident (resources available and/or able semi-consistently able to find strong students with some digging) 1-Not confident (limited resources and/or consistently challenging to find strong students) 0-Awful, please no! (extremely and consistently challenging)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 3-Confident, would want on school list 2-Somewhat confident 1-Not confident 0-Awful, please no
CustomField.label: Recruiting Ranking (3/2022)
